seo.title: Build contextual editing into your site
seo.description: Open-source visual editing experience, backed by git.

blocks.headline: Next Gen Content Management
blocks.text: Tina is an open-source, Git-backed CMS with the ability to add visual editing to your NextJS site

items.headline: Version Control Your Content
items.text: Retain the benefits of a Git workflow for your content and empower all teammates to update your website through a user-friendly interface.

items.headline: Edit with Real-Time Visual Feedback
items.text: Accelerate productivity; see changes in context as you edit your content on your website.

items.headline: Query Your Content

items.headline: Build on Top of Your Components
items.text: Add an editing interface to your React components and give your content team the power to build complex pages.
